attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
my reasons for the legalisation of cannabis is that i feel there is no harm in smoking cannabis. for one their is an estimated 440,000 a year die from smoking each year in britain and approx 25,000 people die each year in the UK alone from alcohol. and i have been searching to see how many deaths have been cause by smoking cannabis in the uk and i can not find a figure for this. and i would like to add that It is of the utmost importance that every cannabis smoker understands that tobacco is not only a more addictive drug than heroin but is responsible each year for 140,000 deaths in the UK, 1 million deaths in the EU.

cannabis is probably the safest intoxicant known to man. It less addictive than sugar or chocolate and it has never been proved to have caused a single death in several thousand years of use.
